casebody.data:
Joseph ADAMO, et al., Appellants,
v.
CITY OF ALBANY, Respondent. Motion No: 2018-157 Court of Appeals of New York. Decided May 1, 2018

On the Court's own motion, appeal dismissed, without costs, upon the ground that no appeal lies as of right from the unanimous order of the Appellate Division absent the direct involvement of a substantial constitutional question ( see CPLR 5601 ).

Motion for leave to appeal denied with $100 costs and necessary reproduction disbursements.
